meanings.definition: A fold of peritoneum connecting the stomach with other abdominal organs.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that the omenta helps hold the stomach in place.
meanings.sent2: During surgery, the surgeon carefully examined the omenta for any abnormalities.
meanings.sent3: The omenta decided to take a break and go on a vacation to explore the other abdominal organs.
meanings.sent4: The omenta was like a bridge, connecting the stomach to the rest of the abdominal neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: I imagined the omenta as a helpful hand reaching out to support the stomach.

meanings.definition: A layer of fatty tissue covering the intestines.
meanings.sent1: The omenta provides insulation and protection to the intestines.
meanings.sent2: The surgeon carefully lifted the omenta to access the intestines during the operation.
meanings.sent3: The omenta felt like a cozy blanket wrapping around the intestines.
meanings.sent4: The omenta was a shield, safeguarding the intestines from harm.
meanings.sent5: I pictured the omenta as a fluffy cloud floating around the intestines.
